name: Custom Faction
description: New faction with characters, loadouts, and group configuration

scripts.description: Loadout configuration for the custom faction

prefabs.name: {PREFIX}_FactionCharacter
prefabs.description: Base character for the custom faction

configs.name: {PREFIX}_Faction

instructions:
1. Edit the FactionInit script to set your faction key, name, and color
2. Edit the LoadoutConfig to define weapons and equipment
3. Create the character prefab with prefab_create
4. Add your faction to the game mode's faction list in a modded SCR_BaseGameMode
5. Test in Game Master by placing faction spawn points
